Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our latest innovation which we believe could significantly benefit your operations. After careful consideration, we're offering this product to you at a special introductory price of $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-value asset at a competitive rate. We're confident it will provide substantial returns on your investment. Should you have any questions or require further information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
